content: blanket consists of 40 granny squares which are first worked and then joined together a border is added at the end see schematic blanket layout for placement of squares pin ball band on each square to mark colour you can follow the colours listed above or create your own colourway by choosing 40 of the 80 colours from the colour pack blanket as given uses half a scheepjes scrumptious colour pack the other half can be used to create yarn the after party 202 scrumptious stripes blanket **list of materials** **scheepjes scrumptious** 50% recycled polyester recycled plastic bottles 50% acrylic 100g/300m -yarn b 377 morello fudge cake x 2 balls **scheepjes scrumptious colour pack** 50% recycled polyester recycled plastic bottles 50% acrylic 80 x 30g/97m - yarn a 301 302 304 305 306 307 308 310 311 313 314 315 318 319 320 324 325 326 329 330 331 332 338 339 342 344 346 347 349 352 353 357 361 364 367 369 372 376 377 378 x 1 ball -4mm and 4 5mm crochet hooks *use remaining 40 colours of the colour pack to make yarn the after party 202 - scrumptious stripes blanket *
